definition: Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: After the downfall of the Tang Dynasty, China entered a chaotic period of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝灭亡以后，中国的历史进入五代十国的混乱时期。

sentences.english: Southern Tang Regime also promotes the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms ultimately to the historical process of reunification.
sentences.chinese: 南唐也推动了五代十国最终走向统一的历史进程。

sentences.english: In the period of five dynasties and ten states, the military governorship of late Tang dynasty continued to develop.
sentences.chinese: 五代十国时期是唐末藩镇割据的继续和发展。

sentences.english: The Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period is the continuation and development of the Late Tang Dynasty opposite to the splittism.
sentences.chinese: 五代十国时期是唐末藩镇割据的继续和发展。

definition: Sixteen Kingdoms of Five non-Han people (ruling most of China 304-439)
Later Tang of the Five Dynasties (923-936)
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Later Han or Eastern Han dynasty (25-220)/Later Han of the Five Dynasties (947-950)
Sixteen Kingdoms of Five non-Han people (ruling most of China 304-439)/also written 五胡十六國|五胡十六国
Later Liang of the Five Dynasties (907-923)
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
